short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open multiple URLs from textarea input in new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bulk URL Opener Extension

Efficiently manage multiple URLs with the Bulk URL Opener Chrome extension. Whether you're a researcher, developer, or avid multitasker, this tool simplifies your browsing experience by allowing you to open numerous URLs simultaneously in separate tabs.

Key Features:

Streamlined Workflow: Paste a list of URLs into the extension, separated by spaces, commas, or new lines, and open them all with a single click.
Customizable Options: Configure settings to open tabs in the background or foreground, maximizing productivity based on your workflow.
Intuitive Interface: User-friendly design ensures straightforward operation, making it accessible for users of all technical levels.
Permissions & Security:

Tab Management: Required to open URLs in new tabs, maintaining your current browsing session intact.
Host Permissions: Enables interaction with specified domains entered by users, ensuring seamless functionality.
Privacy Assurance: The extension does not collect personal data or track browsing activities, prioritizing user privacy and security.
Get Started:
Enhance your browsing efficiency today with the Bulk URL Opener extension. Simplify how you manage multiple URLs in Chrome and experience a more productive workflow.

Additional Information:

Manifest Version: Built with Manifest Version 3, ensuring compatibility with the latest Chrome browser features.
Support & Feedback: We value your input! Contact our support team for assistance or to share your feedback on enhancing the extension.
